Sep
13
Sopchoppy Depot Days
Saturday, September 13, 2025
9:00 AM
1:00 PM
Google Calendar
ICS
From Discover Sopchoppy:
Join us for the Annual Sopchoppy Depot Days, a celebration of our community and the historic Sopchoppy Depot — the last remaining depot on the Georgia, Florida & Alabama (GF&A) line still standing in Florida.
Enjoy a day filled with local heritage, family fun, and small-town charm.
Event highlights:
- Roads & Rails Classic Car Parade at 10 AM down Rose Street. People's Choice trophies for 1st, 2nd, and 3rd place. Free to enter — sign up by Sept 9 on our Facebook page.
- Model Railroad display by the Big Bend Model Railroad Association in the Towles House.
- Local vendors, artisan crafts, and food trucks.
- DJ Butch spinning classic oldies and MCing the parade and car show.
- The Sopchoppy Depot Museum will be open with historical exhibits and artifacts.
- Depot Park offers walking paths, wildflower gardens, a playground, pavilions, and a covered stage.
- Visit unique local shops like Sand and Soul Designs, 118 Vintage & Vain, CIVIC Brewery, Sopchoppy Bakehouse, The Loafers Bench, and more.
Proceeds from vendor fees and merchandise support community projects and nonprofits like Friends of the Sopchoppy River, helping expand river access and the Florida Paddling Trail.
Come out and celebrate Sopchoppy’s past, present, and future with us!

Sopchoppy Depot Days
Saturday, September 13, 2025
9:00 AM
1:00 PM
Google Calendar
ICS
From Discover Sopchoppy:
Join us for the Annual Sopchoppy Depot Days, a celebration of our community and the historic Sopchoppy Depot — the last remaining depot on the Georgia, Florida & Alabama (GF&A) line still standing in Florida.
Enjoy a day filled with local heritage, family fun, and small-town charm.
Event highlights:
- Roads & Rails Classic Car Parade at 10 AM down Rose Street. People's Choice trophies for 1st, 2nd, and 3rd place. Free to enter — sign up by Sept 9 on our Facebook page.
- Model Railroad display by the Big Bend Model Railroad Association in the Towles House.
- Local vendors, artisan crafts, and food trucks.
- DJ Butch spinning classic oldies and MCing the parade and car show.
- The Sopchoppy Depot Museum will be open with historical exhibits and artifacts.
- Depot Park offers walking paths, wildflower gardens, a playground, pavilions, and a covered stage.
- Visit unique local shops like Sand and Soul Designs, 118 Vintage & Vain, CIVIC Brewery, Sopchoppy Bakehouse, The Loafers Bench, and more.
Proceeds from vendor fees and merchandise support community projects and nonprofits like Friends of the Sopchoppy River, helping expand river access and the Florida Paddling Trail.
Come out and celebrate Sopchoppy’s past, present, and future with us!

Proceeds from vendor fees and merchandise support community projects and nonprofits like Friends of the Sopchoppy River, helping expand river access and the Florida Paddling Trail.
Come out and celebrate Sopchoppy’s past, present, and future with us!

Sopchoppy Depot Days
Saturday, September 13, 2025
9:00 AM
1:00 PM
Google Calendar
ICS
From Discover Sopchoppy:
Join us for the Annual Sopchoppy Depot Days, a celebration of our community and the historic Sopchoppy Depot — the last remaining depot on the Georgia, Florida & Alabama (GF&A) line still standing in Florida.
Enjoy a day filled with local heritage, family fun, and small-town charm.
Event highlights:
- Roads & Rails Classic Car Parade at 10 AM down Rose Street. People's Choice trophies for 1st, 2nd, and 3rd place. Free to enter — sign up by Sept 9 on our Facebook page.
- Model Railroad display by the Big Bend Model Railroad Association in the Towles House.
- Local vendors, artisan crafts, and food trucks.
- DJ Butch spinning classic oldies and MCing the parade and car show.
- The Sopchoppy Depot Museum will be open with historical exhibits and artifacts.
- Depot Park offers walking paths, wildflower gardens, a playground, pavilions, and a covered stage.
- Visit unique local shops like Sand and Soul Designs, 118 Vintage & Vain, CIVIC Brewery, Sopchoppy Bakehouse, The Loafers Bench, and more.
Proceeds from vendor fees and merchandise support community projects and nonprofits like Friends of the Sopchoppy River, helping expand river access and the Florida Paddling Trail.
Come out and celebrate Sopchoppy’s past, present, and future with us!
Source:
https://www.facebook.com/events/2106013983201714

Cheers to 4 Years!
Saturday, June 21, 2025
4:00 PM
10:00 PM
Google Calendar
ICS
We’re shore excited to celebrate 4 years of good vibes & great brews — and you’re invited to our most tropical bash yet!
Grab a slice of paradise with Civic's pizza, freshly shucked oysters from Serenoa Shellfish,  shrimp taco and kebab & rice specials from The Mill House, and Fine Coffee caffeinated treats, all starting at 4pm and going until 8 or until vendors sell out (whichever comes first)
Catch the live music wave : Live music starts on the outdoor stage at 5:30 pm with Rockulla and Co. along with Sumpin' Old and Sumpin' New, followed by the rockin' sounds of the River Dogs from 7:30 to 9:30.
Sip on island-inspired hard seltzers
Beat the heat with shaved ice from Kona Ice! 5-7 pm
It’s going to be a shell of a good time! Cheers to 4 years!
